detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Centralex (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Centralex.sol#88-259) has payable functions:
	 - Centralex.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Centralex.sol#243-245)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Centralex](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Centralex.sol#L88-L259) has payable functions:
	 - [Centralex.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Centralex.sol#L243-L245)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
